flipcardBack.bodyTitle: Full Stack Developer - primarily on the java j2ee stack
bodyDescription: I've experience in different framework/ libraries like spring, hibernate, struts, jersey REST

Right now I've shifted my focus on the UI, developing websites with javascript ui frameworks like angular, vuejs , react & developing cross platform mobile application with ionic , nativescript , react native
